message: Bingo: http://pibarsf.com/specials.html Russian River will be pouring Pliny the Younger again, on Valentine's Day! Starts at 3:14pm, and you know people will be lined up outside. Last year I got there at 5pm and it was already gone.
Anyone planning on attending any events? I'm trying to figure out what Pi Bar has planned--last year they had a keg of Pliny the Younger, one of the most legendary beers of Northern California.
I may also go to the Deschutes night at Pi Bar, which on Tuesday 2/15--they'll be pouring Hop Henge, their experimental IPA.
http://www.deschutesbrewery.com/HopHenge_bottle09.gif
cool
Anyone who wants to go to the Opening Gala on Friday 2/11 as a VIP, I picked up a couple of VIP tickets I can't use anymore.
@mko how much?
I bought them for $56/ea but I have been offerring them up for $40/ea. Really, I just want them to get used and recoup a bit of the cost.
That was @djchall — so this shows up in mentions.
as long as you're wearing shirts and shoes, you're good
@mihasya i very much doubt it... usually when beer is involved, there's no dress code
I think we're going to some part of this
yup 2 general admission tix in my email
Now.. they call it a "Gala" but that doesn't mean I have to dress up does it?..
That's what I figured. Their strange choice of words threw me off
Again... I still have two VIP tickets that I can't use if anyone wants them.
@mko are you going to be at the alpha-tester dinner?
@mko hey, sorry.. i emailed my friend and didn't hear back from him
@djchall Most likely not (I hadn't heard of such a thing). Additionally, I didn't start using this until less than a week before it went live.
Why do we only get to have beer week one week per year? Seems silly. Every week should be a celebration of beer.
